item.description:
Williker's (also known as G Williker's) on route 20, near the route 9 intersection, is a "cabin" (so the sign says) that offers BBQ and spirits. The hub of G Williker's is the four-sided bar, a la Cheers, with 4 big screen plasma TVs around the bar. Off the main bar area is a room with a few pool tables, another room that's sort of a bar annex, and the main dining room. Williker's is a fun place to hang out, where everyone knows your name (and if they don't already, they try to). Your glass will never be empty before you are asked for a refill. They have decent crisp onion rings that were the puffy batter variety, served with a creamy/tangy dipping sauce. There are two kinds of ribs, babybacks and "big" ribs (St Louis), which comes with slaw, beans and cornbread.
Let's check this out...........join us for a fun time!
item.name: WILLIKER'S TEX MEX & BBQ
